name: GRAVRYNTH
description:
"...as if the natural world's been turned upside down" -Lord Mandrake

As the world keeps spinning beneath your feet... will you make it home in time?

This is my second game. Smoother gameplay, more levels and music will be included in future updates! (This game runs awful on some computers. I'm sorry about that!)

I hope you have fun with it and leave a comment! 

Tools : 

  • Unity 2019.4.9f1 (C#) 
  • Visual Studio 
  • Pixlr X
  • YouTube (Brackys)
